name: Chapter 2 - The Ocean 🌊
description:
Chapter 2

The Ocean 🌊

The two friends stand together at the harbor and prepare for departure. After receiving the message from Penelope, Pepe gets his submarine ready to go immediately.

It is a bit outdated, but in the current weather conditions it is the only option.

The trip will not only take a few days but will also bring some dangers. In the deep sea you never know what kind of creatures you will meet.
